name: Send personalized SMS from a Google Sheets dataset with D7SMS
description: This template helps you create a SMS campaign from a Google Sheets dataset. First, a list of customers is retrieve from Google Sheets. Then, each data row is filtered to send a personalized SMS with D7SMS. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_lqteymhncsuHppYQkSHxJWAtCaFdp0-bfFAPqFZD6c/edit?usp=sharing).
